articles.title: What happens when an astronaut in orbit says he's not coming back? - Ars Technica
articles.description: "If you guys don't give me a chance to repair my instrument, I'm not going back."
articles.content:
Enlarge/ The STS-51-B mission begins with the liftoff of the Challenger from Pad 39A in April 1985.

articles.title: Asteroid 2024 BM to pass Earth by just a whisker today, reveals NASA; Check size, speed, more - HT Tech
articles.description: NASA says an asteroid, designated Asteroid 2024 BM, is expected to pass Earth by a close margin today, January 22. Know its speed, size, distance of approach, and other details.
articles.content: As per the details issued by NASA's Center for Near-Earth Object Studies (CNEOS), the asteroid has been designated as Asteroid 2024 BM. This asteroid is expected to pass Earth at a distance of approx… [+2488 chars]
